name: Lost Castle (itch) (LowPolyGames, PlusPlus, Willomena, IstalriSkolirProductions)
description:
This is our game that we made for Global Game Jam 2021!

Your castle has been taken from you, you need to sneak in to take back your gold, sword and free your friends! Don't let the guards see you, once the alarm is raised more guards will come hunting for your head!
